name: International Conference on Business, Management and Leadership
content: In a world that is shifting effortlessly, management and leadership are fields with pressing demands that call for new ideas and creative solutions to drive success in today’s dynamic business landscape. To tackle these issues head-on, it is crucial that academics and specialists come together and have meaningful discussions. The International Conference on Business, Management, and Leadership (ICBML) serves as a vital platform for scholars from around the globe to convene, exchange new findings, and share groundbreaking ideas. Through promoting collaboration and knowledge sharing, ICBML plays a crucial role in influencing the direction of management and leadership, bringing about transformative change, and ensuring that businesses thrive in a constantly changing environment. The ICBML Management Conference 2024 is scheduled to take place in Liverpool, UK, from May 17–19, 2024.
